Yang Hyong Sop Meets Member of European Parliament 
   Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Glyn Ford, member of the European Parliament from the British Labour Party, and his companion at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
